loginAgain.th: Please logout, re-login, and try again.
loginAgain.en: Please logout, re-login, and try again.

incorrectPassword.th: รหัสผ่านของคุณผิด

tokenExpired.th: Your token has expired.  Please logout and re-login.
tokenExpired.en: Your token has expired.  Please logout and re-login.

userCancelled.th: Login process was stopped by you.
userCancelled.en: Login process was stopped by you.

userMismatch.th: Credential given does not correspond to you.
userMismatch.en: Credential given does not correspond to you.

userSignedOut.th: You are signed out. Please re-sign in.
userSignedOut.en: You are signed out. Please re-sign in.

weakPassword.th: Your password is too weak.  It must be at least six characters long.
weakPassword.en: Your password is too weak.  It must be at least six characters long.

invalidEmail.th: The email address is improperly formatted.
invalidEmail.en: The email address is improperly formatted.

unverifiedEmail.th: Your email address is not verified.  Please verify it.
unverifiedEmail.en: Your email address is not verified.  Please verify it.

webStorageUnsuppprted.th: Web storage is unsupported. Please update or use a different browser.
webStorageUnsuppprted.en: Web storage is unsupported. Please update or use a different browser.

tooManyRequests.th: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
tooManyRequests.en: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
